Stanza 1:

n3S n3S p   n3 n3 n3S   n3SRp  Sn n

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
suduneeril vizhundhu thudikkindra meen pOl 
thOgai nenjinil sOgam pongudhammA
